alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 08 at 5:28AM PDT until April 10 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: 528 AM PDT Fri Apr 8 2022 ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SATURDAY TO 5 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Locally stronger winds across the higher peaks and ridges. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains, Eastern Santa Clara Hills, East Bay Hills. * WHEN...From 5 AM Saturday to 5 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected Saturday night into Sunday morning across the interior mountains.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains
